entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is the giant that Harry and his friends are visiting. He is mentioned as someone they had followed to visit before.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is a monster that lives in a lair and is mentioned as being visited by Harry three years ago.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is accompanying him on this visit. She is described as having a steely voice and is shown to be confident in their path.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is someone who is following Harry and his friends. She trips over a fallen sapling and is not helped up by the others.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in this story. He is described as being cautious and worried about making noise.

relationships.description: Harry has visited Grawp before, three years ago.
Hermione and Umbridge are following Harry on this visit.
Harry visited Aragog three years ago.
Umbridge tripped over a fallen sapling, and Hermione did not help her up.
Harry is accompanying Hermione on this visit.
